Item.Value: [Text:Hi. My name is $Character_15$. You just came to town right? I've never left the town before, what's it like?][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Hey, $Name$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.][Default]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Name:ShopOpen]
